thread.title: Mark Clattenburg Reportedly Will Referee EPL Matches Before Move to Saudi Arabia
thread.title_full: Mark Clattenburg Reportedly Will Referee EPL Matches Before Move to Saudi Arabia

author: Matt Jones
title: Mark Clattenburg Reportedly Will Referee EPL Matches Before Move to Saudi Arabia
text: Mark Clattenburg Reportedly Will Referee EPL Matches Before Move to Saudi Arabia Catherine Ivill - AMA/Getty Images Matt Jones Featured Columnist February 20, 2017 Premier League referee Mark Clattenburg will officiate four more matches in English football's top flight before making his move to Saudi Arabia, it's been reported. It was recently revealed that Clattenburg was quitting the Premier League to take up a post as Saudi Arabia's new refereeing chief with immediate effect. However, according to Neil Ashton of The Sun , he will oversee a minimum of four more matches in England before he departs. More to followâ€¦
